entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider renaming unixinterface.cpp #61818
  • Create a kusto queries to monitor runtime tests related lanes on rolling build #61817
  • Update Mono version to .NET6 for TE official run #61816
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Tracking: iOS - Size reduction #61815
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails ungracefully with overloaded methods #61814
  • Parallel.For with long running tasks blocks background Timers on NET 6.0 #61804
  • HttpHeaders thread safety and behavior of invalid values #61798
    7.0.0
  • Performance profiler support and memory dump diagnostics for WebAssembly #61797
  • system.text.regularexpressions.tests.regexmatchtests.match_cachedpattern_newtimeoutapplies #61794
  • Clean up AnyOS handling in build-test-job.yml #61790
  • .Net 6 `System.Random` returns only 0 after a while when initialised with a seed #61789
  • [Perf] Regression in Perf_Regex.Uri_IsNotMatch(IgnoreCase, Compiled) #61786
  • [Perf] Changes at 11/12/2021 4:32:49 AM #61785
  • [Android](CryptoNative_HmacUpdate): Parameter 'data' must be a valid pointer' #61783
  • System.Text.Json source generation producing invalid code on generic JsonSerializable types #61782
    7.0.0
  • The default `ArgumentException` message is misleading #61779
  • Invalid AssemblyVersion in ref subfolder of System.ComponentModel.Annotations package #61778
  • The mscordbi.dll for .NET 5.0.12 is missing from symbol servers #61775
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator ignores properties from base records defined in separate assemblies #61772
    6.0.x
  • DataAnnotations are filtered for uniqueness #61770
  • Cannot sign certificates with elliptic curve secp256k1 #61767
  • Spurious Newlines Added to Log Output #61763
  • how to check the program run state whether can call mono_alc_free #61762

Closed

  • Specific .NET 6.0 Desktop Application won't launch from folder other than Install folder #61769
  • [API Proposal]: Additional ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull overloads #58047
    Future
  • system.text.regularexpressions.tests.regexmatchtests.match_cachedpattern_newtimeoutapplies #61796
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestGetProcesses fails on devices #60588
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/X86Base/Pause_r/Pause_r.sh #61709
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Create separate yml that can trigger full test runs on demand #61132
    7.0.0
  • Issue with Aspose PDF library under net6.0 #59327
  • [API Proposal]: EnumConverter support for numeric/string in but always numeric out #61726
  • FileSystemEnumerable has some issues when the item gets deleted during enumeration on Linux #61764
    7.0.0
  • Race condition writing Microsoft.Interop.DllImportGenerator.dll during library product build (Windows x64 Release) #61687
  • Performance Improvement: Value Range Test #61664
  • Apparent memory leak in .NET versions 5 and 6 when enumerating an IAsyncEnumerable. #61717

PullRequests

Created

  • ZipArchive: Apply strategy pattern depending on ZipArchiveMode #61820
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Improve superpmi-asmdiffs AzDO pipeline robustness #61819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stabilize host's UpgradeCode and ProviderKey #61810
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Update list of analyzer diagnostics with JSON entries #61809
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Don't flag methods with known unsupported UnmanagedType #61808
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Skip System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListenerTests.XmlWriterTraceListenerTests on iOS/tvOS #61807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement use GeneratedDllImport #61805
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests for AOT #61803
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Use reflection or a compile-time only shim assembly to reference unexposed corelib types. #61802
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job (Try 2) #61801
  • Include arch specific headers in standalone JITs #61800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Let argument check run before aborting check. #61795
    area-System.Security
  • Try to skip pause_* tests again #61793
  • Brand release/6.0-maui branch appropriately #61792
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expand Regex One/Notone/Setlazy simple code gen support to Lazy #61784
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Encapsulate the logic of caching the last synchronously completed task. #61781
    community-contribution
  • Add JitDisasmWithDebugInfo #61780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations for CreateDirectory #61777
    area-System.IO, os-linux, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntityImpl #61774
    area-System.Xml
  • Optimize XmlTextEncoder.Write #61773
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable some skipped Android tests #61771
    area-System.Net
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant based on the Clang impl #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add BuildTargetFramework option to GenerateReferenceSource docs #61760
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix a few special cases of projects with command line arguments #61758
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Apply BuiltInComInterop feature switch to managed code #54056
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: support OSR for synchronized methods #61712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert System.Net.* over to GeneratedDllImport #61765
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Fix building DllImportGeneratorSample #61806
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix the only ilproj test that uses multiple command-line variants #61750
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Revert "Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job. (#61745)" #61799
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add tests verifying fast-path semantics for nullable structs #61711
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add ThrowIfNull overload for pointers #61633
    new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job. #61745
    area-Infrastructure
  • [iOS] Follow up changes for 61590 #61670
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Add single char lazy loop support to simplified Regex code gen #61698
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Remove duplicate checks #61766
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Area Owners for System.Data #61748
    area-Meta
  • FileStatus.Unix/Process.Unix: align caching of user identity. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • CreateDirectory: eliminate some syscalls. #58799
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add support for dumping and using precise debug info #61735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Reduce the output from tests. #61593
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.Data.Odbc, System.IO.Ports, System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController #61741
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Convert Crypto P/Invokes to GeneratedDllImport. #61742
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Update DNNE version to 1.0.27 #61738
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Create runtime clone to manually kick off full test runs #61641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove race condition from DllImportGenerator build #61695
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Tie sdb agent lifetime to the ExecutionContext and simplify the api #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Upload dasm files as artifacts for "asmdiffs pipeline" #61700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `DisableImplicitNamespaceImports_DotNet` #61656
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][interp] Fix handing of native types #61612
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Adding support for the X86Base.Pause intrinsic on Mono #61707
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #61655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #61079
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS (#61590) #61659
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-ios
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix issue #60543 #60544
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use char override Writer for System.Private.Xml #61722
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Extract ECAlgorithm from ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61753
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [System.Text.Json] Move inline throw statements to `ThrowHelper` #61746
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't run the JIT formatting job in CI #61485
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #61461
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][private] Fix xunit xharness fails #61595
    arch-wasm
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Add nested static attribute support. #61508
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Handle empty string parameter value in MetadataLoadContext #61457
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Convert TryGetRawMetadata comment to XML documentation #61515
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • File.CopyTo: try to pre-allocate disk space for large destination files #61676
    area-System.IO, os-linux, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix #61560. #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing static library should also publish other necessary static libs #1733

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add instructions for more advanced tests building #1735
  • Enable FeatureGenericMath #1732
    area-NativeAOT
  • Fix infinite recursion in GetDisplayName(this TypeSystemEntity) #1734
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Custom marshaller work. #1723

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DOTNET_WATCH_* Environment Variables in MSBuild #22673
  • .NET 6 GzipStream.Flush method implementation questions #22671
  • Analysis mode for code style analyzers does not work in .Net SDK 6 #22667
  • Latest dotnet sdk 3.1 doesn't build project with C#10 #22662

Closed

  • Recent System.CommandLine upgrade broke source-build in 6.0.2xx #22640
  • Cannot get a .NET Core 3.1 app to run on .NET 6 with `dotnet run` on macos-arm64 #21401
    6.0.2xx
  • Cannot sign certificates with elliptic curve secp256k1 #22660

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor AOT Publish Integration Tests #22682
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676
  • Don't split collect command into multiple collect commands #22666
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project WindowsRuntimeComponent to current framework #22661
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Bump system command line source build version #22674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use MessageImportance.Low for log statements. #22638
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Exclude runtimeidentifiers for runtimepack #22658
    Area-Workloads
  • Change messages for ILLink #22636
    Area-ILLink
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 as 1604 goes out of support soon #17260

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameterless struct initialization re-uses values #57870
    17.1
  • "Add 'DebuggerDisplay' attribute" might not be respecting user preferences #57867
  • IBCMerge error for EditorFeatures.Wpf in signed build #57863
  • c# Intellisense insert a new row pressing enter while it is disabled #57858
  • Deadlock in project system #57857
    17.1.P2
  • Editor Context Menu allows to view Call Hierarchy on Property Setters, but Search finds no results #57856
  • List-patterns: hold Receiver directly in bound node for implicit indexer access #57855
  • Exclude switch arms from brace placement options #57854
  • CS8073 false possitive for linq to SQL #57852
  • Strange CS0426 error where CS0201 would be more appropriate #57850
  • Feature Request: Add or Unify "Add Await" and "Introduce local for" in context actions #57849
  • Naming Rule for Event Handlers #57848
  • Changing namespace to match directory structure in whole directory #57847
  • Select builder item if nothing in the CompletionList matches what user typed #57846
  • Add an option to the C# code editor to simulate case insensitivity #57845
  • When auto implementing an interface or abstract class, I would like the ability to choose on the fly between auto generated and throwing properties #57844
  • Enhance "Move Type To {FileName}.cs" Refactoring to be Generic-Aware #57843
  • Copy data type name from variable #57842
  • C# 10 File Namespace usage autoformat #57841
  • .editorconfig editor root config display #57840
  • Partial Class File Function List Should List Only the Function in the File #57839
  • VBCSCompilerServerTests+ShutdownTests.Standard is flaky #57837

Closed

  • Outlining tag calculation should not block document open #47188
    Next
  • .NET 6 release broke switch expression formatting #57736
    17.1
  • Simplify interpolation (IDE0071): Should it not flag ToString("with-an-argument")? #57851

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean-up/enhance completion telemetry #57868
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #57866
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57862
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch go-to-impl to be entirely async/non-blocking. #57861
    Area-IDE
  • Added additional test from duplicate VS feedback item. #57860
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve SemanticModel handling of receiver under BoundIndexOrRangePatternIndexerAccess. #57859
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid eagerly running formatting or simplification for Extract Method #57838
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify sqlite authoring now that we're 64bit only #57836
    Area-IDE
  • Fix add-braces crash in top-level #57835
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Use test accessor task instead of async operation to wait for LSP server shutdown in tests #57824
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57869
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build #57832
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57865
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bypass IBCMerge for EditorFeatures.Wpf #57864
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • [17.0] Overload resolution was ignoring HasTypeArgumentInferredFromFunctionType for calls in expanded form #57737
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57872
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE
  • Fix deadlock switching the project context dropdown #57833
    Area-IDE
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move Default VB Version to 16.9 #57688
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Tweak SemaphoreDisposer to null out the held semaphore #57831
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • [WIP] Use cached delegate instances for method group conversions #6642
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Blocked, cla-already-signed, Community
  • Use InvariantCulture for generated log file name in FileLogger ctor #57816
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [wip] allow lsp handlers with different type arguments #57834
    Area-IDE
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect completion when adding @bind attribute to input #38511
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Unmarshalled calls with arrays is much slower with WASM 6.0.0 #38510
  • Webassembly AOT Crashes Android Mobile (v96) #38508
  • Performance issue: Why Blazor Web assembly loop is far slower than Javascript? #38505
  • ModelState validation result should be consistent between `BadRequestObjectResult` and `ApiControllerAttribute` #38504
  • Implementing a custom IServer is not as easy as it should be now that some classes have been made internal #38503
  • Blazor JSInterop failure/exception not reported in Blazor app #38502
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor JSInterop failure on Chrome/Edge #38501
  • GRPC Web does not pass cookies #38500
  • Multiple jwt authentication schemes are not working #38498
  • Blazor lazy loading and plugin architecture #38497
  • .NET6 PublishSingleFile got a Empty path name is not legal. (Parameter 'path') error #38493
  • unsubscribe message or remove handlers in signalr? #38489
  • Something wrong with AuthorizationMessageHandler in .net 6 #38486
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Latest .NET SDK 7.0.100-alpha.1.21558.2 not found. Blocking development #38485

Closed

  • Blazor and .NET6 creates an error: EntrypointInvoker in assembly Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly #38436
  • Why was the "Individual User Accounts" option removed? #38457
  • Virtualize compnents adds and removes placeholders in an endless loop #38494
  • Mixing Blazor WebAssembly and Blazor Server Pages in same application #37131
    Backlog
  • Inferred Parameter Error Message Suggests Incorrect Attribute #38482
    7.0-preview1
  • Dashboard like Phoenix Liveview Dashboard for ASP.NET Core 7 #38207
  • Not Able to Navigate Custom URL using GetUriWithQueryParameter #38478
  • Blazor Server Side - WebSocket closed with status code: 1006 () #38492
  • Reloading(forceReload:true) doesn't refill "offline-cache-..." if empty/absent #38495
  • Razor should have it’s own SFC #38499
  • Describe that ResponseCachingOptions takes Bytes as input. #38490
  • Server component not working #38496
  • open a page as modal? #38459
  • [BUG]: Reiterate. <PageTitle></PageTitle> not works in WebAssemblyPrerendered mode #38484

PullRequests

Created

  • Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38509
    area-web-frameworks
  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • fix - Error message rename `[FromService]` -> `[FromServices]` #38487
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    Working, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38427
    area-infrastructure
  • chore - Use `HttpMethods` #38466
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Add duration as an option to dotnet-counters and fix a null reference… #2755
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Use new set of analyzers #2744

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • not able build maui blazor or maui app project #3451
  • @Eilon Consider using SkiaSharp for painting HTML/CSS UI onto the screen. #3449
  • Make ListView ViewHandler friendly #3448
  • Add args to IWindow.SendBackButton so that users have context about where the back button click originated #3447
  • Add support for appsettings.json #3446

Closed

  • Editor inside VerticalStackLayout automatically grows vertically on Android/WinUI but not on iOS #3425
  • [Bug] Pushing to any page inside our controls sample that has a frame causes an exception inside CollectionView #3348
  • MauiRazorClassLibrary sometimes doesn't build when building the SLN, causing StaticWebAssets to fail #3434
  • [Bug] Image is not always displayed when HeightRequest in not set on Android #2623

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Entry and Editor to use Windows 11 styles #3444

Merged

  • MAUI 395 port editor Autosize to handler #1202
    do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Don't queue up layout changes from ScrollView #3442
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Blazor] Force conversion from static web assets to happen after project references have been resolved #3450
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Correctly dispose the test dispatchers #3436
  • Update MauiAppBuilder.cs #3445
  • Fix Scoping of MauiContext as it relates to Modal Pages #3361
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3441
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Added dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨
  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools
  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • An item with the same key has already been added #26757
  • Query: Rownumber conversion needs better logic to figure out partitions #26756
  • EF Core 6 reports variable name '@XXX' has already been declared #26754
  • Query: Property binding on the result entity from grouping.First #26753
  • Self-referencing entity circular dependency happening just on EF Core 6.0 #26750
  • Operations on IQueryable after GroupBy.Select #26748
  • Query performance decrease when updating from 2.1 to 5.0 #26747
  • Bug in Navigation Fixer when replacing records that contain a HashSet #26745
  • EF core 6 selecting null values despite where clause asking for not null #26744
  • EF incorrectly sets "Precision" instead of "Scale" on "VarTime" data types in EFCore.SqlServer #26742
  • Code inheritance without database inheritance #26741
  • Null semantics compensation missing for LIKE negation #26735

Closed

  • Calling SqliteConnection from Microsoft.Data.Sqlite v6.0.0 throws TypeInitializationException #26729
  • Blazor - disposed DbContext conflicts with other instance of DbContext #26743
  • Evolve null-checking approach #19233
    7.0.0
  • TypeLoadException on Update-Database with EFCore 6.0.0 #26749
  • Re-attaching m2m entities on a skip navigation #26610
  • TemporalAll() in Temporal Tables with child entity gives System.InvalidOperationException when used with Include() #26704
  • Translating this query requires the SQL APPLY operation, which is not supported on SQLite. #26684
  • Could not install package 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 6.0.0'. You are trying to install this package into a project that targets '.NETFramework,Version=v4.7.2', but the package does not contain any assembly references or content files that are compatible with that framework. For more information, contact the package author. #26683
  • Cannot create default/global query filter with variable when using an EntityTypeConfiguration class. #26666
  • Foreign Key Case Sensitive Issue in EF Core v5.x #26647
  • DbScaffold should honor table names in n:m-relations #26607
  • Int64 properties cannot be queried in EntityCore #26603
  • Does .UseLazyLoadingProxies() not work in XUnitTests? #26597
  • Slow inserts in EF Core after upgrading to .Net 5 #26570
  • EF Core materializes projection property as object with default values instead of null #26551
  • EF Core 6 Unable to set up a many-to-many relationship between '' and '' because one or both of the navigations don't have a corresponding CLR property #26721
  • How to *not* nest entities with CosmosDb provider? #26746
  • EF Core 6 get notmapped/ignored members #26594
  • Ensure temporal tables tests run on PRs/C.I. #26040
    7.0.0
  • EF Core 6.0 InvalidOperationException: The object has been removed from the model #26611
    6.0.1
  • 'The object has been removed from the model.' when building model #26659
    6.0.1
  • EF Core 6.0 regression when using HasDefaultSchema() with ToTable(null) #26651
    6.0.1

PullRequests

Created

  • test and fix for Issue #26742 #26758
  • Fix some docs issues #26755
  • Tools: Use App.config on .NET Core #26752
  • Update NuGet packages #26751
  • [release/6.0] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26739
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26738
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26737
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Metadata: Remove obsoleted code #26740
    auto-merge
  • No skipped complex navigation tests #26561
  • Additional tests for Temporal tables #26682
    community-contribution
  • Remove quirks from main #26736
  • Update command to set connection string for SqlServer on Ubuntu #26055
  • Update to Mac 11 image #26732
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26728
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Test on .NET Framework #26733
  • Test mechanism to automatically rewrite baselines in source code #26723
  • Query: Fix double negation in SQL generation #26734

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warn users when installing x64 SDK on non-x64 machine #12708

PullRequests

Created

  • Temporarily disable client ip logging #12711
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12706
  • Exclude ASP.NET runtime packs from Android #12702

Merged

  • Remove 2.1 templates from dynamic templates #12511
  • Update Windows SDK projection #12699
  • Update Windows SDK projection #12698
  • Update Windows SDK projection #12697
  • Update Windows SDK projection #12696
  • Update dotnet toolset used in source-build #12701

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
